activities: PROS may receive Personal Data concerning European Customers through various means, including: (1) directly or indirectly from the Customer; (2) from a European affiliate or subsidiary; or (3) through other means. PROS provides products and services to help customers improve performance through analysis of customer pricing and other business information. PROS functions as a processor of its customers' information. PROS may receive Employee Personal Data: (1) directly or indirectly from the Employee; (2) from a European affiliate or subsidiary; or (3) through other means. As permitted by applicable law and third-party policies we also may collect Personal Data from third-party sources. PROS uses Employee Personal Data for business and employment purposes.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer and employee data
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution / American Arbitration Association Safe Harbor Program.  For employees, the applicable Data Protection Authority.
